name: Devil Die
description:
Would you dare to play dice with a devil?

Devil Die is a mini-game created within two weeks using the Unity Engine.It's a simple "Slots" inspired game where the main objective is to survive as many rounds as possible without rolling 6-6-6.

At the end of each round, the devil will attempt to cheat by bringing the numbers of your rolled die closer to 6. Eventually new types of die are introduced into the mix as you progress!
